content: * this is the ad-free printable pdf version of this pattern you can find the free pattern at https //theturtletrunk com/easy-breezy-super-chunky-bun-beanie-crochet-pattern/ the easy breezy super chunky bun beanie is a beginner friendly crochet bun beanie pattern it features a hole at the top so you can wear your hair up in a bun or ponytail but still keep your ears and head warm this beanie works up in less than 30 minutes and uses less than 1 skein of yarn difficulty beginner sizes child 3-10 years teen/adult small adult medium adult large supplies super bulky 6 weight yarn 74-106 yards 9 00mm m/n crochet hook yarn needle scissors hair elastic optional pattern includes - reference photos - link to free video tutorial - gauge pattern - detailed instructions for 4 sizes you are more than welcome to sell your finished items but please give the turtle trunk credit as pattern designer if you have any questions about this pattern please email theturtletrunk@gmail com my patterns including all photographs are copyrighted you may not copy re-distribute or sell my pattern
